answers.answer: Hi,I’ll suggest 2 tests for the same. Firstly, diabetes needs to be ruled out by doing blood sugar/urine sugar and secondly, benign enlargement of prostate should be ruled out by doing a per rectal examination and an ultrasound of the prostate gland. I sincerely hope that helps. Take care.

question: A 42 year old man wakes up at night every 3-4 hours to urinate. This has been happening for two years. He does not drink water before bed time and does not drink caffinated beverages. Is this abnormal and if so what could it be?
title: Urination at Night
